step_zh: 分析实验现象，确认一氧化碳燃烧生成二氧化碳，并与石灰水反应生成碳酸钙
step_en: Analyze the experimental phenomena to confirm that carbon monoxide combustion produces carbon dioxide, which reacts with limewater to form calcium carbonate
clip_video_path: /home/devdata/Dataset/Exp-Com/4k/4k_1/processed/chemistry/ch_67/video/02-一氧化碳的燃烧/02-一氧化碳的燃烧_step_5.mp4
subject: chemistry

annotations.text: 这是因为一氧化碳在空气中燃烧
annotations.text_en: This occurs because carbon monoxide combusts in air

annotations.text: 二氧化碳与石灰水反应
annotations.text_en: The carbon dioxide reacts with limewater

annotations.text: 生成不溶于水的白色碳酸钙固体
annotations.text_en: Forming white calcium carbonate solid insoluble in water
